attributes.action: make a fixed term for an administration of 4 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
it would be an advantage to all in the country if the date for general elections was fixed to a 4 year cycle. 
This would stop govenments cutting and running before their term was up. 
It would also mean that the public would know when the election was to be. 
It would stop governments from cutting and running before bad news came.
